subtitle: Intraday VWAP — volume-weighted average price during the session.

measures.how_to_read: Reference line for fair price; price above = buyer control; below = seller control.
measures.caveats: Resets each session; requires reliable intraday volume.
measures.what_it_measures: Volume-weighted average price for the session.

best_when: Intraday mean reversion and pullback entries

assistant_hints: VWAP resets each session; don’t compare across days.
Use distance bands (% from VWAP) to avoid chasing.
Prefer liquid hours; thin sessions distort VWAP.
Combine with volume or OBV for confirmation.
beginner_summary: Intraday VWAP — volume-weighted average price during the session.
